sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of FLIR Systems topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 6.4%.
Year to date, FLIR Systems registers a 0.4% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is American International Group, trading down 8.9%.
American International Group is lower by about 6.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Freeport-McMoran Copper & Gold, trading down 2.4%, and Procter & Gamble, trading up 3.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
